mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rm, board.* FROM (SELECT b.*, (select count(*) from comments where boardNum= b.boardNum ) as commentCount from board b WHERE boardStatus = 0 AND kind = #{kind} START WITH GROUPID=0 CONNECT BY PRIOR boardNum=GROUPID ORDER SIBLINGS BY boardNum desc) board ) WHERE rm BETWEEN #{startRow} and #{endRow}
SELECT MAX(boardNo) FROM board WHERE kind = #{kind}
SELECT boardNum FROM board WHERE kind = #{kind} AND boardNo = #{boardNo}
select * from (select rownum rm, b.* from (select * from board where boardStatus = 0 and kind = 1 order by boardNum desc ) b ) where rm between 1 and 4
mapper.update: update board set hit = hit+1 where boardNum = #{boardNum}
update board set boardStatus = 1 where boardNum = #{boardNum}
update board set title = #{board.title}, category=#{board.category}, content = #{content} where boardNum = #{board.boardNum}
